text: Wucherer's worm lizard (Leposternon wuchereri) is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in Brazil. ==References== Category:Leposternon Category:Reptiles described in 1879 Category:Taxa named by Wilhelm Peters Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Brazil
title: Wucherer's worm lizard
